title: 90/149/EEC: Council Decision of 22 March 1990 authorizing the Portuguese Republic to extend until 8 April 1991 the agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 22 March 1990
authorizing the Portuguese Republic to extend until 8 April 1991 the agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
(90/149/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Portuguese Republic is hereby authorized to extend until 8 April 1991 the agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa, which entered into force on 9 April 1979.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 March 1990.
For the Council
The President
P. FLYNN
